pullRequest.body:
This previously only worked for normed fields, now it works for seminormed algebras.
There is no particular motivation for this beyond seeing where `NormedSpace` is too strong.

---

  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8603545534/job/23575680672)

Initially I thought that this made things less general (one only gets a `𝕜`-subalgebra, not a `β`-subalgebra, but then I realised you can just let `𝕜 = β`, so it's more general. Two definitions are changed but the proof that the new definitions equal the old ones when specialised is `rfl` in both cases.

Initially I thought that this made things less general (one only gets a `𝕜`-subalgebra, not a `β`-subalgebra, but then I realised you can just let `𝕜 = β`, so it's more general. Two definitions are changed but the proof that the new definitions equal the old ones when specialised is `rfl` in both cases.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: generalize `boundedFilterSubalgebra`
